post.body: I love those guys! Tell Todd I said "hello."
If only.
No worries! Not your fault!
Congrats! If branding doesn't work out, there's always a fallback now.
Nah, I'm jealous I can't come and hang out with you guys again!
ouch. I knew I was a rockstar in my own head, but I'm afraid that's as far as the fantasy plays out.
yeah, this time. But next time drinks are on me, sister!
pretty please.
Yep - a hot lap for the WOMMA Board Mtg.
Very nice! Thanks for the shout out!
Gotcha. @KeithElam = bad.
Or, you know, Google alerts.
Simple: I stalk you.
Very cool. We love those that love us!
Good to know. Just making sure!
Thank you for the witness!
Wow. Many thanks!
Crapit. I'll get @genochurch and @gregorycordell on it ASAP!
You're right. No complaining here.
Agreed.
Many thanks, Libby. You are too kind!
Thx for the perspective. Have a great wknd. And then lets rock this out.
Awww, thanks!
good vibes?
You're killin' me. SOfunny.
Smart stuff. Others could learn from you...
Preach it!
Kindred spirits!
Amen to that
Sorry, it's not. It's the local bar that we've frequented just about every Thurs for 5+ years now.
But of course! He's Master of Karate
Nah. It's Always Sunny in Philly episode
Or is that LIBBYerating?
Great question. I think it was getting there, but they are still entrenched in the traditional ad mentality...
You got it. I'm sure it's great stuff!
Yes mam, several times. But we like to focus more on "contests" that judge creativity + results, like the EFFIES and ReBrand 100.
Second.
Sorry to hear that. But tomorrow is a new week!
You go Bob!
just rocked out an incredible research presentation on the Fiskateer movement! Powerful new data! Great job, Dodsy!
But of course
Aww, anticipation is a good thing in the news, right?
Many thanks, Cara!!
not trying to do the self-promo thing. Just genuinely excited.
I (heart) you, too
Chicora Alley. Google it!
Yeah, But I'm easy.
I vote for "gain some."
That's me. Wait for it....Wait for it....Wait for it...
Does the FAIL blog count?
I'm just sayin'.
Many thanks. It was truly a group effort!!
I think I've got the picture. Thanks! And go Vandy!
Really? Who?!?
Oh. I thought you had something to tell me.
Done. What's up?
That sounds like a nice challenge!
Nice!
Ha! @gilliatt No doubt. @jvlane257 Agreed.
Very nice!
Yeah, but is it "general knowledge?!?!?"
You know I will. Happy New Year.
Yeah, but if you are already a member they took a month off of your fees, which is nice of them.
Agreed.
They just cancelled 75+ flights at Ohare. Thankfully I'm not on one of them. Yet.
BTW, if I didn't mention it already, go Ford! My first car was a 1964 Ford Falcon.
Random thing I just wanted to yell at the airport bar: "I'm Rick James, bitch!"
Snow and ice on the ground and I'm at Ohare. Did I mention I SO dislike this airport?
Weigh in on the brand new WOMMA Ethics blog: http://snurl.com/7pib1 (Disclosure:Brains on Fire is a member and serves on the board)
Traffic and rain on the way to O'hare.
Dear Chicago: Holy cold.
A lot of unhappy travels in CLT whose flights got cancelled to Denver.
Retweet: @robbinphillips Check out the 1st perfromance of the Brains on Fire HAKA: http://tinyurl.com/6paedj
Can someone please turn up the temp in Chicago before Iget there? Mkay, thx!
Ah, GSP, my old friend.
Did I mention that @brandautopsy sent us a gift? http://snurl.com/7s4pn
Sending the team off to MSP. Safe travels to @genochurch, Heather and @gregorycordell!!
Does anyboady have an ark they can let us borrow here in Greenville?
ITBusiness.ca Headline:"Will Microsoft release a Zune phone next year?"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!
For the last time, I don't want to join your Facebook group.
If you want to take this as an ego tweet, so be it, but I am constantly blown away with the creativity that comes from the folks I work with
Dear marketers: If you write yet another version of "Twas' the Night Before Christmas" to push your product I will go postal all over you.
Lighting and pouring rain. And I need to go outside. Guess it could be worse!
Want to hear from our peeps in MSP!
If you're using the "down economy"to scare people into using your product or service, YOU ARE WRONG!!
Chicora time.
Dayman. Fighter of the nightman. Champion of the sun...
Wait a sec, I just channeled my father there. Sorry about that.
My mom has the best penmanship I've seen. (Just got the family Holiday letter.)
Jimmy crack corn
Always in beta? Nah. It's NEVER in beta.
Just got the email for the 2009 call for entries for the local Addys. Not. Gonna. Do it.
What would happen if we all picked up one piece of trash per day?
Yeah i dont know what they are doing either http://twitpic.com/u2r6

CNN reports: Stocks rally, with the Dow closing above 9,000 for the first time since November. Ye-freakin-haw people.
Stock market broke 9K. Go! Go! Go! Go! Go!
FYI - my penmanship sucks.
What do you call it when everyone's an expert on the same thing?
